name: gulp-bootstrap
description: works with gulp, but does nothing. Use it to bootstrap your own gulp plugin with TypeScript, Travis and npm.

scripts.release: (git pull origin master && npm version patch && git push origin master && git checkout release && git merge master && git push origin release && git checkout master)
scripts.startdev: (git checkout master && git pull origin master)
